text: Juan Carlos Kayser Cruz (born July 22, 1996 in Veracruz City, Veracruz) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for Veracruz. ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Mexican footballers Category:C.D.
